name: BALLUXE 🔴🟢🔵⚪
description:
🔴🟢🔵⚪

A score attack, surviv-ball, ball-ect'em up, ball-et hell game that gets progressively more hectic as you play. Move the paddle with your mouse and use the mouse wheel / left and right arrows to rotate through the paddle colours (red, green, blue and white) in order to collect balls of the same colour while dodging the other balls. Look out for the 20+  modifiers than can make or break your run. 

Multiple difficulties for the discerning gamer.

made for the itch.io jam, LOWREZJAM 2022 ~ https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam-2022
